com.zapp.library.merchant.util

Class PBBALibraryUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zapp.library.merchant.util.PBBALibraryUtils

  • public final class PBBALibraryUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Internal utility class for the Zapp Merchant Library. Do not use this class as it is not part of the API and its methods can change without notice.
    Since:
    1.0.0

      • isOpenBankingAppButtonClicked

        public static boolean isOpenBankingAppButtonClicked(@NonNull
                                                    android.content.Context context)
        Checks whether the user has opened the bank app by clicking the button from the popup dialog. If so, second time the bank app should be opened automatically.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use.
        Returns:
        true if it was clicked, false otherwise.
